# Module cache Copy item path

<a href="https://docs.rs/iceberg/0.7.0/src/iceberg/cache.rs.html#18-63" class="src">Source</a>

Expand description

Cache management for Iceberg.

## Traits<a href="https://docs.rs/iceberg/0.7.0/iceberg/cache/index.html#traits" class="anchor">§</a>

<a href="https://docs.rs/iceberg/0.7.0/iceberg/cache/trait.ObjectCache.html" class="trait" title="trait iceberg::cache::ObjectCache">ObjectCache</a>  
A trait for caching in-memory objects of given type.

<a href="https://docs.rs/iceberg/0.7.0/iceberg/cache/trait.ObjectCacheProvide.html" class="trait" title="trait iceberg::cache::ObjectCacheProvide">ObjectCacheProvide</a>  
A trait for caching different in-memory objects used by iceberg.

## Type Aliases<a href="https://docs.rs/iceberg/0.7.0/iceberg/cache/index.html#types" class="anchor">§</a>

<a href="https://docs.rs/iceberg/0.7.0/iceberg/cache/type.ObjectCacheProvider.html" class="type" title="type iceberg::cache::ObjectCacheProvider">ObjectCacheProvider</a>  
CacheProvider is a type alias for a thread-safe reference-counted pointer to a CacheProvide trait object.
